message.body: (1/2) Are you guys crazy busy these days? Is there anytime in your schedule between now and monday to fix a leak in the access panel of the shower/tub at my re
(1/2) Thursday is a ok. If you can get there at, or before 9a, I can meet you with the keys. Otherwise I can stash them somewhere for you and just let the tenan
(2/2) ts know you'll be coming. Let me know what's best.
Just try to let me know by some time tomorrow.
Early in the morning tomorrow would be best. I have a job in the afternoon
Ok. Is it easier if I just drop off keys to you tonight? That way you can get there when you get there... or would you rather me meet you?
(1/2) Ok. I won't get home until close to 9 after work, so it'll be after then. I'll leave a note with the details. And I'll text you my work number in case you
(2/2) have questions when your there. THANK YOU
